clearcontrol.microscope.state

Class AcquisitionStateBase<M extends MicroscopeInterface<Q>,Q extends QueueInterface>

  • java.lang.Object
    • clearcontrol.core.device.name.NameableBase
      • clearcontrol.core.device.NameableWithChangeListener<AcquisitionStateInterface<M,Q>>
        • clearcontrol.microscope.state.AcquisitionStateBase<M,Q>
  • Type Parameters:
    M - microscope type
    Q - queue type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    HasChangeListenerInterface<AcquisitionStateInterface<M,Q>>, NameableInterface, ReadOnlyNameableInterface, AcquisitionStateInterface<M,Q>

    public abstract class AcquisitionStateBase<M extends MicroscopeInterface<Q>,Q extends QueueInterface>
extends NameableWithChangeListener<AcquisitionStateInterface<M,Q>>
implements AcquisitionStateInterface<M,Q>
    Base class providing common fields and methods for all acquisition state implementations
    Author:
    royer
